---
id: pix-brcode-parse-json
title: "Load, validate and parse the json payload"
description: "Load the DynamicBRCode payload, do all security validations and parses the contents to the json format."
sidebar_label: "Load, validate and parse the json payload"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: reference/pix-indirect/btg-pactual-banking-as-a-service-pix-indirect-participant
custom_edit_url: null
proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Load, validate and parse the json payload"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/pix/brcode/dynamic/payload/{url}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Load the DynamicBRCode payload, do all security validations and parses the contents to the json format.
> The URL value must be URLEncoded.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"examples":{"BtgPactualPayloadUrl":{"value":"api.sandbox.developer.btgpactual.com/v1/p/d/c0afe38fe41d4778b9e08d1c815baf83"}},"name":"url","description":"The json payload url without the 'https://' prefix.\n\n> The URL value must be URLEncoded.","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Root Type for BRPayloadJsonResponse","description":"","type":"object","properties":{"body":{"description":"The json payload.","title":"Payload Json Debt Collection","required":["txid","calendario","revisao","status","valor","chave"],"type":"object","allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"calendario":{"title":"Calendar","description":"The fields nested under the calendar identifier organize information regarding collection time control.","allOf":[{"title":"Creation","required":["criacao"],"type":"object","properties":{"criacao":{"format":"date-time","title":"Creation Date","description":"Timestamp that indicates the moment when the collection was created. It respects the format defined in RFC 3339.","type":"string"}}},{"title":"Presentation","required":["apresentacao"],"type":"object","properties":{"apresentacao":{"format":"date-time","title":"QR Code Presentation Timestamp","description":"Timestamp which indicates the time at which the JSON payload representing the debt was recovered. That is, ideally, it is the moment when the user made the capture of the QR Code to verify the payment data. It respects the format defined in RFC 3339.","type":"string"}}},{"title":"Expiration","type":"object","properties":{"expiracao":{"format":"int32","title":"Debt collection life time, specified in seconds.","description":"Debt collection life time, specified in seconds from the creation date (Calendario.criacao)  Default: 86400 (1 day)\n","type":"integer","example":"3600"}}}]},"revisao":{"format":"int32","title":"Review","description":"Debt collection review. Always starts at zero. Always varies in increments of 1.","type":"integer"},"status":{"title":"Debt Collection Status","enum":["ATIVA","CONCLUIDA","REMOVIDA_PELO_USUARIO_RECEBEDOR","REMOVIDA_PELO_PSP"],"type":"string"},"txid":{"title":"Transaction Identification","description":"# Transaction Identification\nThe txid field, mandatory, determines the transaction identifier.\nThe purpose of this field is to be an element that enables the PSP of the receiver to present the user with the functionality of payment reconciliation.\nOn pacs.008, is referenced as `TransactionIdentification <txId>` or `idConciliacaoRecebedor`.\nThe txid field is limited to 35 characters in pacs.008.\nIn terms of workflow, txid is read by the payer's PSP application and, after payment is confirmed, it is sent to the SPI via pacs.008.\nA pacs.008 is also sent to the receiver's PSP, containing, besides all the usual payment information, the txid.\nWhen you notice a receiving with txid, the PSP of the receiver is able to communicate with the user receiver, informing that a specific payment has been settled.\nTxid is created exclusively by the receiving user and is under his responsibility.\nThe txid, in the context of representation of a collection, is unique by CPF/CNPJ of the receiver user. It is up to the receiving PSP to validate this rule in the PIX API.\n","pattern":"[A-Z0-9]{26,35}","type":"string"}}},{"title":"Base Debt Collection","description":"Attributes common to all Debt Collection entities","type":"object","properties":{"valor":{"description":"All fields that indicate monetary values follow the format of ID 54 of the EMV/BR Code specification for QR Codes. The decimal separator is the dot character. The thousand separator is not applicable. Examples of standard values: \"0.00\", \"1.00\", \"123.99\", \"123456789.23\".","required":["original"],"properties":{"original":{"allOf":[{"title":"Value","pattern":"\\d{1,10}\\.\\d{2}","type":"string"},{"title":"Value","description":"Original debt amount."}]}},"title":"Root Type for CollectionAmount","type":"object","example":{"original":"17.23","retirada":{"troco":{"valor":"10.00","modalidadeAlteracao":0,"modalidadeAgente":"AGPSS","prestadorDoServicoDeSaque":"12345678"}}}},"chave":{"title":"DICT receiver key","description":"The key field, mandatory, determines the Pix key registered in DICT that will be used for debt collection. This key will be read by the payer's PSP application for consultation with DICT, which will return the information that will identify the receiver of the debt.","maxLength":77,"type":"string"},"solicitacaoPagador":{"title":"Request to payer","description":"The solicitacaoPagador field, optional, determines a text to be presented to the payer so that he can enter a correlated information, in free format, to be sent to the receiver. This text will be filled in pacs.008 by the payer's PSP in the RemittanceInformation <RmtInf> field. The size of the field <RmtInf> in pacs.008 is limited to 140 characters.","maxLength":140,"type":"string"},"infoAdicionais":{"title":"Additional information","description":"Each respective additional information contained in the list (name and value) must be presented to the payer.","maximum":50,"type":"array","items":{"required":["nome","valor"],"type":"object","properties":{"nome":{"title":"Name","description":"Name Field.","maxLength":50,"type":"string"},"valor":{"title":"Value","description":"Data Field.","maxLength":200,"type":"string"}}}},"pixCopiaECola":{"description":"","title":"Pix Copia e Janeiro610820000100623605321b74809e904d41dbb5177c1b548e01936304EB3E"}}}]},"status":{"format":"int32","description":"The Http status code.","type":"integer"},"version":{"description":"The api version.","type":"string"}},"example":{"body":{},"status":200,"version":"1.0.0"}},"examples":{"BRPayloadJson":{"value":{"version":"1.0.0","status":200,"body":{"calendario":{"criacao":"2020-09-15T19:39:54.013Z","apresentacao":"2020-04-01T18:00:00Z","expiracao":3600},"txid":"fc9a4366ff3d4964b5dbc6c91a8722d3","revisao":3,"status":"ATIVA","valor":{"original":"500.00"},"chave":"7407c9c8-f78b-11ea-adc1-0242ac120002","solicitacaoPagador":"Informar cartao fidelidade","infoAdicionais":[{"nome":"quantidade","valor":"2"}]}}}}}},"description":"OK"},"400":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"PactualErrorResponse","description":"Default response body in case of any errors.","type":"object","properties":{"version":{"description":"Api version.","type":"string"},"status":{"description":"Http status
